|utc_offset_DST = |coordinates = |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m = 780 |elevation_ft = |postal_code_type = }} Hermel is a town in Lebanon. It is located in the Baalbek-Hermel Governorate, in Lebanon. Its inhabitants are overwhelmingly Shia."Lebanon: largest cities and towns and statistics of their population".
